interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: WING Fly Grl Mane-Taming Gel Wand 8ml
Review Date: 2022/04/26
Store: Wing
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'All', 'Liquid Volume': '8 Milliliters', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'Wing', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.27 x 0.74 x 0.74 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'UPC': '810023041894'}
Review Text: I have tried hair flyaway gel before that comes with a mascara wand but this one comes with a wand that looks like it would go to a lipgloss. I feel like the wand itself makes it messier to apply because you are just rubbing it on your hair instead of brushing it to catch all the flyaways. The gel itself works well but you just have to apply a little more pressure with the wand to get it to go where you want to go.
Review Title: Good hold
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
2Pcs Summer Crystal Sequins Unicorn Girl Alligator Hair Clips (Holo+Pome Purple)
Summer Crystal
{'Brand': 'Summer Crystal', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Polyester, Cotton', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Count', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Product Dimensions': '3.25 x 2.75 x 0.75 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'UPC': '635638430488'}
There are two sparkling unicorn hair accessories with alligator clips included in this set. They are good quality and handmade. They are easy to stick into thin hair for any little girl to enjoy. I love the sparkle and the girlyness of these hair clips!
Cute!
Eggplant Clearing Cleansing Oil Pad 60 pads, Makeup remover pad. Exfoliating. Simple easy quick wipe. Moisturizing cleansing oil pad
PAPA RECIPE RIGHT FOR SKIN
{'Brand': 'PAPA RECIPE RIGHT FOR SKIN', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '3.98 x 3.82 x 2.72 inches; 10.86 Ounces'}
These oil removing and make up removing wipes work well! There are 60 pads in this container. It also comes with a plastic tweezers so you can remove one pad without touching all the rest of the pads with your fingers. The lid flips open for easy daily access.
Moisturizing
Gold Collagen Under Eye Patches Mask for dark circles and puffiness by Levitural - Golden Eye Bags Treatment - Mother's Day Gift for Women
LV Levitural
{'Brand': 'LV Levitural', 'Item Form': 'Mask', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing,Hydration', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '3.25 x 3.25 x 1.6 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '766234785310'}
I love how sparkly these eye masks are! It’s soothing and helps to reduce wrinkles under your eyes. There’s a little spatula that comes with this so you don’t have to use your fingers to dig in the jar to get that I am ask. It’s good quality and I recommend it!
Sparkly!
invisibobble Pink Ball Hair Ties with Coil, TWINS Prima Ballerina - Ponytail Holder - No Damage, Wrap and Twist - Pain-Free Hair Accessories for Girls and Women - Gentle for Girls Teens and Thick Hair
invisibobble
{'Color': 'Prima Ballerina', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'Invisibobble', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Language': 'Spanish', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 0.87 x 1.85 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IB-TW', 'Manufacturer': 'invisibobble'}
The pictures on this product make it seem like you can use this bobby hair tie in a ponytail. This is not true. My hair is very thin and with any type of hair tie I have to tie it at least three times. I cannot make this hair clip wrap around and stay wrapped around my thin ponytail. I can do this at the end of a braid with less hair. It is cute but it is difficult to make it stay closed.
Difficult to make this stay closed

The pictures on this product make it seem like you can use this bobby hair tie in a ponytail. This is not true. My hair is very thin and with any type of hair tie I have to tie it at least three times. I cannot make this hair clip wrap around and stay wrapped around my thin ponytail. I can do this at the end of a braid with less hair. It is cute but it is difficult to make it stay closed.
Cannot stay closed around a ponytail
AOA Studio Collection Makeup Sponge Set Makeup Blender Latex Free and High-definition Set of 5 Makeup Blender For Powder Cream and Liquid, Super Soft Wonder Blender Beauty Cosmetic Beveled
AOA STUDIO
{'Brand': 'AOA STUDIO', 'Color': 'Ivory', 'Material': 'Rubber', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '6.85 x 5.39 x 1.97 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '850022931338'}
These make up blenders are soft and great for applying foundation. They don’t absorb too much of the foundation and they help to apply it in an even way. Part of the proceeds go to help animals and need which is nice. They are also made in Texas. They are easy to clean and reuse.
Great for applying foundation
WING Fly Grl Mane-Taming Gel Wand 8ml
Wing
{'Hair Type': 'All', 'Liquid Volume': '8 Milliliters', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'Wing', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.27 x 0.74 x 0.74 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'UPC': '810023041894'}
I have tried hair flyaway gel before that comes with a mascara wand but this one comes with a wand that looks like it would go to a lipgloss. I feel like the wand itself makes it messier to apply because you are just rubbing it on your hair instead of brushing it to catch all the flyaways. The gel itself works well but you just have to apply a little more pressure with the wand to get it to go where you want to go.
Good hold
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Style Preferences:** The user continues to enjoy sparkly and playful accessories that convey a whimsical, youthful aesthetic appealing to all ages.

- **Target Audience:** Their focus remains on products catering to children while simultaneously attracting adults, illustrating a love for youthful charm across demographics.

- **Quality and Craftsmanship:** The user values well-designed items that balance aesthetics and functionality. They are becoming increasingly discerning, particularly appreciating products that offer effective performance and demonstrate quality craftsmanship.

- **Functionality:** A high priority is now placed on practicality, especially for hair accessories designed for fine hair. Recent experiences have raised their expectations for products to perform as advertised, showing a notable desire for reliability alongside visual appeal.

- **Consumables and Self-Care:** Their affinity for self-care products remains strong, particularly those formulated for sensitive skin. Convenient and hygienic options that simplify application are still a priority, with an emphasis on products that deliver effective results.

- **Recent Sentiment:** The user shows a preference for products that embody fun aesthetics while also delivering on performance, especially in makeup and beauty tools. They prioritize effective practical solutions that enhance their self-care routine. Their commitment to purchasing products that contribute to positive causes, such as animal welfare, continues to reflect their values in buying decisions. Recent interactions indicate a recognition of the importance of product applicators, highlighting the need for ease of use in achieving desired results.
